Interface MailConfigurationTags

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurationTags
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MailUtilProvider

    public interface MailConfigurationTags
extends ConfigurationTags
    Tags for the XML element in a configuration file that governs mail messages.
